alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 07 at 2:59AM PST until March 07 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts 35 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Ventura County Coast and Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 2 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Coast
